message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a unique item that will bring you a lot of value. Would you like to buy it from me for $150?
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $120 for it.

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. However, I've had other interested buyers who are willing to pay a premium for this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $140 for it. Would you be willing to pay that amount?
I understand you need to get at least $140, but I'm not sure I can go that high. Can we meet in the middle at $130?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob, but I'm still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get at least $135 for the product. Can you see your way to that price?
I'm getting closer to your target price, but I'm still a bit short. Can we meet in the middle at $132.50?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm getting closer to my target, but I still need to get a bit more for the product. I'm willing to meet you at $137.50, but that's as low as I can go. Can you make it work?

I understand you're trying to get a good price, but $137.50 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product, which is my absolute maximum. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle somewhere around there.

I understand you've reached your maximum, Bob, but I'm still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get at least $130 for the product. I'm not going to go any lower than that. Can you meet me at $130?
I've reached my maximum price of $125, and I'm not willing to go any higher. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price. If not, I'll have to consider buying from John for $100.
